title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft operation on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces in a default text editor, nothing moves.
EB: The expected behavior is that when executing the ShiftLeft operation on lines with intermixed tabs and spaces in a default text editor, the lines should be shifted to the left.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Type in the following: <space><tabs>some text<tabs>some text2.
3. Highlight the two lines above.
4. Execute the ShiftLeft operation.
5. Notice that nothing moves.
